snippet.title: PSX Longplay [601] Small Soldiers
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

I played this game a fair bit as a kid but only the 1v1 multiplayer which I had a lot of fun with. I also tried recording the single player a few months ago but I found the controls a little difficult to get used to so gave up. This time I attempted the single player but I lowered the difficulty setting which in the end I dont think was needed. The sound and visuals of the game are amazing but the gameplay gets old quickly. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
